actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional income tax exemption to a taxpayer supporting a dependent who is mentally retarded.

summary.text: Provides an additional income tax exemption of $600 under the Internal Revenue Code to a taxpayer supporting a dependent who is mentally retarded.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an additional income tax exemption to a taxpayer supporting a dependent who is mentally retarded.
